description: The Enterprise Manager agent has detected an occurrence of
an event for which it has no specific trap.

Summary.eval: ($v8 ne '') ? '$v8' : (($v5==-1) ? 'Enterprise manager agent event $v2 cleared' : 'Enterprise manager agent event $v2 detected for service $v3')

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventOcc ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventName s EXAMPLE ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventID i 9999 ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventService s EXAMPLE ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventTime s EXAMPLEEXAM ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventSeverity i -1 ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventUser s EXAMPLE ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventAppID i 9999 ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventMessage s EXAMPLE ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventArguments s EXAMPLE ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventResults s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the event that occurred.
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventName

description: The ID of the registration that generated this event occurrence.
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventID

description: The name of the service (database, SQL*Net listener, etc.)
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventService

description: The time at which this event was detected.
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventTime

description: A relative measure of the severity of the event.
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventSeverity

description: The name of the user who registered for this event.
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventUser

description: The ID of the Enterprise Manager console application through
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventAppID

description: The arguments that were passed to the script that detected
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventArguments

description: The results generated by the script that detected this event.
variables.name: ORACLE-AGENT-MIB::oraAgentEventResults
